section.title: Pre-Integration Checklist
section.para: The following installation and integration instructions assumes an understanding of VMware's ESXI and vSphere products for setting up virtual environments.
Please review the following requirements for the VMware vSphere environment.
Before you install or upgrade NSX, verify your software versions. The following are the required versions.

entry.para: VMWare ESXi and vSphere Appliance (vSphere web Client)

section.para: A vCenter server (appliance) is required to manage the vSphere environment. It is recommended that you install a vCenter appliance as an ESX virtual machine.

important.para: Each ESXi compute cluster is required to have shared storage between the hosts in the cluster, otherwise attempts to create instances through nova-compute will fail.
